title: Official Records
title-note: United Nations Economic and Social Council
additional-note: This appears to have begun as a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. WorldCat records suggest, however, that at least some volumes were published or co-published in the United States.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
